abstract: Stocks drop as investors react to company news and report on consumer prices, in addition to signs that dollar could resume surge.
lead_paragraph: Wall Street drifted down while European shares neared record highs in choppy global equities trading on Tuesday as the dollar rebounded and oil prices fell.

headline.main: Market Slips Despite Encouraging Economic News
headline.print_headline: Surge in the Dollar Has Investors Fretting

snippet: Wall Street drifted down while European shares neared record highs in choppy global equities trading on Tuesday as the dollar rebounded and oil prices fell.
